name: SRI SATYASAI INSTITUTION FOR TECHNICAL ADVANCEMENT (S.SITA)
briefDescription: OUR ORGANIZATION HAVE DOING IN MANY WORK SUCH AS :- IN AGRICULTURE , SHG FEDERATION , YOGA , DISASTER MANAGEMENT , SOCIAL WORKER AS HELP THE POOR PEOPLE . WE HAVE 7 EXECUTIVE MEMBERS , 9 GENERAL MEMBER AND 10 STAFF . FARMERS , FIELD WORKERS , DALITS, NGOS.
